recipes.cookingMethod-1: Cook pasta according to package instructions. While pasta is cooking, combine basil, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, and garlic in a food processor and blend until smooth. Drain pasta and toss with pesto sauce. Serve immediately.

recipes.cookingMethod-2: Preheat oven to 450°F. Spread tomato sauce over pizza crust. Top with mozzarella cheese and chopped basil. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

recipes.cookingMethod-3: In a large bowl, beat heavy cream and sugar until stiff peaks form. In a separate bowl, combine espresso and Kahlua. Dip ladyfingers in espresso mixture and layer in a 9x13 inch dish. Spread mascarpone cheese over ladyfingers. Top with whipped cream. Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

description: Chef David is a passionate advocate for sustainable, locally-sourced food. description: Chef Frank is a classically trained chef with a passion for creating comforting, hearty dishes that are full of flavor. He draws inspiration from his Italian heritage and is known for his handmade pastas and slow-cooked stews.
